"Twin Machineguns Boot Camp III":
"There you are. That's right, it's your training officer,
Barbara, again. It appears you've been devoting
yourself to your training. I can tell by the photons
around you. You should have a good grasp of the
basics of twin machineguns usage by now, so this
time, let's do some comprehensive training.
Show me everything you've got.

*Complete the mission with an S Rank
using twin machineguns only."

"待ってたわ、指定教導官のバルバラよ。
精進は欠かしていないようね。
身に纏ったフォトンを見ればわかるわ。

ツインマシンガンの扱いについて
基礎は出来上がってきているはずよ。
一度、総括的な特訓を行いましょう。
持てる力をすべて見せてちょうだい。

※双機銃系限定、Sランククリア"
